explainer.p1: This is a demo task manager. The goal is to demonstrate how to make HTTP requests (webhooks).
explainer.p2: Simply sign up for an account and try creating a few tasks for yourself.
explainer.p3: The recipient of your API requests is the
explainer.p5: another demo project of ours. Since your authorization token is simply the _id of your account you should not create tasks that contains sentitive or identifiable details about yourself.
